definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.chinese: 更换的系统模块又一次重新安装。

sentences.english: A single concrete tank required for Bio-Module shaft.
sentences.chinese: 生物模块轴需要一个单独的水泥池。

sentences.english: Please Populate Memory in Pairs for Normal Operation.
sentences.chinese: 请成对安装内存模块以使其正常运行。

sentences.english: The communication between the panzer and commanding car is realized by the wireless data transmission module.
sentences.chinese: 装甲车辆与指挥车之间的通信通过无线数传模块实现。

sentences.english: Components that are changed together should be grouped into one module.
sentences.chinese: 应该将一起进行更改的组件分组到一个模块中。

sentences.english: As an example of deaerator system, the basic modularization modeling method is presented.
sentences.chinese: 以除氧器系统为例，给出了模块化建模基本方法。

sentences.english: Installs redistributable merge modules and a set of graphics.
sentences.chinese: 安装可再发行的合并模块和一组图形。

sentences.english: In most cases, this module should only be used for debugging purposes.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数情况下，这个模块只是用于调试目的。

sentences.english: Secondly, implement the link resource management module of AMSON.
sentences.chinese: 设计实现AMSON资源管理模块。

sentences.english: Save the mediation module and restart it.
sentences.chinese: 保存中介模块，并重新启动它。

sentences.english: Time from valid output on signal to relay energization by module.
sentences.chinese: 信号时输出的有效中继模块通电了。

sentences.english: A simple, low - cost, isolated flyback power supply energizes a DVM module.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单廉价的隔离反激式电源DVM模块供电。

sentences.english: When used within a module, for example, the error message includes the module name and line number.
sentences.chinese: 当在模块中使用时，错误消息中包含模块名称和行号。

sentences.english: When used within a module, for example, the error message includes the module name and line number.
sentences.chinese: 当在模块中使用时，错误消息中包含模块名称和行号。

sentences.english: STM is a low coast A. S. K. SAW transmitter module.
sentences.chinese: 扫描隧道显微镜是一种低海岸调幅声发射模块。

sentences.english: The USB transmission module of portable data acquisition instrument is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种便携式数据采集仪的USB通讯模块。
